page.title: 17Employment,Sherburn-in-Elmet
page.content: There are banks,estate agents and insurance companies.Bowyers,the bacon factory pack meat and make sausages. British Gypsum provide the raw materials for plaster boards.Most shops sell food,bread,farm produce, fruit and vegetables.Sherburn has a surgery,clinic,opticians,chemist, dentist,library, restaurant,garages and schools.There are two churches and one chapel.South Milford Squash Club provides entertainment.The airfield gives pleasure and employment.There is an art gallery and a lace maker,also a garden centre.Both Sherburn and South Milford are served by the railway, being used for passenger and freight. Many people are unemployed because of the lack of jobs.They do not want to travel a long way to work.Some people do not have their own transport.
